text: Saya n kel menginap di kanvaz u yg ke 3 kali nya..Kanvaz adalah salahsatu hotel yg tetap bertahan n tdk berubah baik servis maupun fasilitasnya yg ok  dr sebelum n sesudah pandemi..Selama Otober - Nov saya menginap disana hampir 1 bln..Kanvaz sdh seperti rmh kedua u saya n kel n kami selalu memesan 2 kamar yg connecting...Kanvaz selalu menyambut tamu yg dtg dg ramah di lobby..baik dr petugas parkir smp petugas hotel senuanya ramah2 n sangat membantu..check in tdk membutuhkan wkt lama..kamar selalu dalam keadaan sdh didisinfektan, bersih,  dg ameneties yg lengkap,bantal n kasur yg sangat nyaman serta handuk bersih yg lengkap baik u kamar mandi atau pool..saya menginap di lagoon pool shg memudahkan anak2 u lsg berenang dr kamar..U makan pagi,cukup lengkap n enak.ada Kanvaz Patiserrie by Vincent Nigita yg menjual macarrons dll yg terkenal enak di bali...banyak selebgram,artis,org2 terkenal yg dtg u sekedar brunch,dinner atau menginap disana..Bangunan hotel tdk terlalu besa tetapi bagus, sangat terawat,terang n selalu bersih..di Kanvaz jg dilengkapi ruang gym,massage dll yg bs digunakan kapan saja..kebersihannya cukup terjada.lokasi Kanvaz jg dekat kemana2..baik mau ke kafe2 di seminyak, canggu atau umalas atau hanya di sekitar Kanvaz..bbrp kafe2 hits di Bali lokasinya berdekatan dg Kanvaz jd kita tdk perlu jauh2 pergi u bs menikmati kafe2 itu..lokasi Kanvaz sangat strategis n terbaik n cukup dekat dg pantai..saya selalu merekomendasikan teman2 yg akan ke Bali u menginap di Kanvaz..krn selalu puas dg pelayanan n fasilitasnya..saya selalu memasukkan Kanvaz ke dlm list yg hrs saya datangi setiap ke Bali..terima kasih Kanvaz..saya n kel akan segera kembali mengunjungi Bali n menginap di Kanvaz
title: Tempat menginap paling menyenangkan di seminyak,Bali..

text: Myself and my wife stayed at the Kanvaz for 6 nights from the 15/7 and enjoyed every minute of our stay. We had a pool access room (107) with breakfast and could not have been happier with our package which was very competitively priced. The breakfast was great, the staff were just beautiful and the manager Devi was a delight to deal with and so very friendly and professional. The 100m pool is the centre piece and the day beds either side are just fantastic and a great place to relax or just lay back and sip a cocktail. The further additions that are coming include a fitness centre, top end restaurant and rooftop bar which will only improve this already great hotel. We just loved the place, the staff and the location which was so close to many of the best restaurants in Seminyak.
title: Beautiful new oasis in the heart of Seminyak

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I never write reviews, but this hotel experience requires one. We purposely stayed at the Kanvaz for a longer period of time because we did not want to switch hotels throughout our stay, and due to the disaster experience, in a 9 day span, we had to switch rooms 3 times. Mid way through our stay, we came back to our room, and could not even breath in there. It had smelled like someone just painted our entire room, or some weird toxins and smells were going in. When we informed the staff, they had us wait outside by the pool while they inspected. When we were allowed back in, all they did was spray some nasty smell to cover up the smell. Our room then just smelled like fresh paint mixed with their nasty spray. After getting  a headache, we demanded to be moved. The first room they showed us to move into wasn't even acceptable, so we refused to go there. They then moved us to a new room. At this point we had missed our dinner reservation while dealing with all this nonsense. We switched rooms, and within 2 minutes noticed there were bugs all over the new room. We spent the first 10 minutes in our new room just trying to kill the bugs. After calling to complain about the bugs, the staff informed us there was nothing they could do because the manager was gone for the day... After writing an angry email, and demanding something be done, she offered to switch us to a suite for the last two days of our stay... so we still had to spend several nights in this awful second room. The whole experience was awful. We tried avoiding the hotel as much as possible because at this point we were just uncomfortable staying there. 

Also, the hotel room lacked serious lighting. It was so dark and dim in there, we could barely see ourselves when trying to put our make up on. Honestly, I could go on with a list of other issues we had... but I will leave it at this. 

Besides location, the hotel has nothing going for it. Last, most the facilities listed on their website are not even ready yet... false advertising.
title: DO NOT STAY HERE.

owner_response.text:
Dear Azin S,

Thank you for your feedback from your recent visit and for staying with us. We are deeply sorry for the smell and the bugs, we have checked the issue and rectified the same. With regards to the lighting we will look into this again with our team to see where we can do better. At the same time our sincere apologies that we were unable to fulfill your request for room upgrade immediately as you requested as all of our suites were occupied and we trust that the team found an immediate suitable solution when available.

We hope that you give us the opportunity to welcoming you back in the near future and please do contact us and we will ensure to look after the arrangements for your return visit

With best regards,
Kanvaz Resort Seminyak

text:
Amazing resort! 
Welcomed with fresh drinks upon arrival :) check-in was smoothly done despite our early arrival. 
The room had beautiful design for our honeymoon and received a complimentary small cake for my husband’s Birthday. 
The service was good and fast. Breakfast was good but having more fresh fruits and veggies could have made it better.
Highly recommend this resort.
title: Highly recommended

text: My third visit to Kanvaz and yet again they did not disappoint!  Everything about Kanvas is superb from the phenomenal pool (especially Lagoon Access room) to the delicious food (which is available 24 hours) I cannot fault Kanvaz and the staff.  I would particularly like to mention how amazing the spa/wellness centre is at Kanvaz, the massages and treatments are the best in Bali and the facilitator Ketut goes over and above in his level of service and attention to detail.  Thank you!  I will definitely be staying here again and again.  My home in Bali!
title: Kanvaz is the BEST

text: Kanvaz is a wonderful hotel and place to be. They offer a lot for example the yoga lessons and the core and cardio  training with Ajus are really perfect. We enjoyed a lot! Thank you for everything!!!
title: Beautiful stay with great staff

text: Another fabulous stay at Kanvaz.  We keep coming back to this hotel for the atmosphere, standard and wonderful service.  Thank you to everyone at Kanvaz and look forward to seeing you again shortly for our next stay.....If you are unsure on where to stay, make sure this hotel is part of your plans!
title: Another brilliant stay!

text: We had a wonderful and memorable stay at Kanvaz. Beautifully designed hotel with gorgeous pool, rooftop, a must try patisserie with amazing desserts, spotlessly clean rooms, good location close to many eateries, delicious breakfast, free yoga class and excellent customer service from every single staff. Keep it up! Highly recommended and we will definitely be back!
title: Beautiful resort with excellent service!

text: KANVAZ hotel in Seminyak was magnificent. I struggled at first trying to find a place that ticked all the boxes as I checked out of the original 5 star hotel i booked after 1 day. I spent 25 days staying at Kanvaz resort and everything was amazing. From my beautiful lagoon room to the food. My private sundeck with entry into the lovely pool was perfect for me being only a few steps from my very comfortable bed. Staff service was impeccable but not overwhelming, yes I could still enjoy drifting off in the thought without being constantly smothered. But I only needed to request  assistance and I would be looked after. I felt special from the moment I arrived. A special thank you to Duty Manager Ade who helped me settle in and cool down with a fresh strawberry ice tea upon arrival. If not for her patience with me being hot thirsty hungry and flustered I would have struggled further to find a resort. I highly recommend Kanvaz resort for either a perfect week away or a longer stay. There is too much to write about how good this resort really is including the price! Thank you again Kanvaz for your hospitality and kindness, leaving me with fond memories of my first time in Bali. Oh and breakfast is definitely not to be missed! Staff will ensure you start your day satisfied.
title: Mr Kite

text: We stayed at Kanvaz resort we have an awesome experience the staff were so friendly and accommodating the rooms were clean and the pool and rooftop were amazing, I can’t fault a thing would definitely come back
title: Kanvaz resort Seminyak

text:
Our first stay at Kanvaz and definitely would not be the last. Everything about this hotel exceeds my expectations, from the comfortable room, friendly service and beautiful decor. The pool is a massive plus, very relaxing and enjoyed the floating pillows while sunbathing under Bali sunshine. 

There is a good selection of dishes at the breakfast buffet, and the restaurant in the lobby is open 24/7. Super fast WIFI too. 

The gym is small but adequate and has a yoga studio. Overall, we had an enjoyable stay and will be back in September.
title: An amazing stay at a beautiful property in Seminyak

text:
Comfortable, clean and tidy hotel.  all the goods are Good especially the nasi goreng komplit, the breakfast is available from Indonesian dia ges until western dishes.  The staff is also kind and attentive to the guests.
  On weekends the hotel is very full, this hotel is in a strategic location because it is close to Petitenget beach, Near the hotel there are also mini markets, cafes and bars.
  The swimming pool is also very large, located in the center of the hotel. Not only that, there are many other facilities that we can enjoy, such as a spa, gym and yoga class.
title: Kanvaz

text: Enjoyed my last time stay here and I have to say I will remember it forever. The hotel room was clean, tidy, modern and spacious.  Breakfast is perfect. Devi making the service was 6 star I couldn’t fault a single thing. Thank you for making an everlasting impression on us we highly recommended this hotel. we will be back !
title: Most recommended place to stay !

text: Everything at the hotel was absolutely amazing. Very friendly and accommodating staff(especial shoutout to Ade), great food, spectacular rooms and a great location if you're staying in Seminyak. The hotel is at walking distance from Potato head - a must visit day club.  I stayed at Kanvaz for my honeymoon and they welcomed us with a beautiful honeymoon setup in the room, overall, we had a wonderful experience and would love to go back!
title: Exceptional hotel in Seminyak

text: This is one of it not the best hotel I’ve ever been to. The workers here make you feel like royalty. I needed a towel after I got out of the pool and one of the workers asked if I needed one. I said yes and he came back and rapped the towel around me and had a conversation with me. The breakfast buffet is amazing, there’s waffles, pancakes, cereal, hot/ice chocolates and the list goes on. If you are looking for a hotel in Bali, this is your #1 go to spot!!
title: BEST HOTEL EVER

text: This was our 1st hotel of 4 on our 18 day holiday of Bali and Lombok . We liked it was a modern hotel . The staff as in all of Bali are excellent. Breakfast has amazing choice ( loved the English muffins) . We found our room to be clean albeit a little compact , perhaps the pool rooms were more spacious but we prefer a higher floor with no one above us . Good location , lovely  impression at reception. Our only negative was perhaps asking late night returners  ( Semiyak is a lively area) to be consider their noise wouldn’t be a bad idea , we were woken in the early hours by partying guests . It’s very close to Potato Head beach - but be aware Semiyak beach isn’t the cleanest
title: Lovely modern clean hotel

text: It’s in Petitenget and very good location. Waking distance to the beach and many ships and restaurants. Rooms are nice and comfortable. Very big pool , the hotel has a berry nice 20s , 30s design . Price is suit cheap . Nice roof top bar , gym and spa .
title: Nice hotel very good price

text:
We loved our 7 day stay at Kanvaz Village Resort! The staff are lovely, attentive and take the effort to get to know you + your preferences. We used the laundry service which was affordable and handled with care. 

Breakfast had great options to accommodate to those with dietary requirements or cultural preferences. Room service menu could be a bit more expansive but the options that we did try were delicious and honestly better (and cheaper) than some of the local restaurants. The Patisserie is next level - honestly some of the best sweets and pastries I’ve ever tasted. 

We stayed in the Lagoon Pool Access room - highly recommend paying the extra money for this room as the pool is lovely at all hours of the day and is so beautiful to swim in. I did note that the hotel employees were cleaning the pool daily and maintaining the gardens + surrounding areas of the establishment. The housekeeping staff do an excellent job too. 

The gym is well maintained + equipped, and the spa is incredible. I had pregnancy massages daily and I love that I could have one right before bed (they’re open late). Special shout-out to the ladies in the day spa as the whole experience is luxurious, calm and elevated. 

The location is at the top of Seminyak so not too central to the main areas but we actually preferred that as it is quieter. Plenty of nice cafes/restaurants around the area, or a short walk or taxi to other places. 

We’re definitely planning on staying here again during our next trip to Bali. Thank you to the staff of Kanvaz Village Resort for an incredible experience!
title: Amazing value for high quality experience

text: This hotel is awesome. Friendly staff, clean rooms and in great location.  Definitely the best stop for couples.  The swimming pool is fantastic, bed comfortable, but once more the best is the staff.  The patisserie also one of my daily favourites! Thanks to all that have made our stay of 8 days a magnificent experience!
title: Great Hotel - Great Location

text: This hotel is really like an oasis in busy Seminyak street …. When we are inside it feels so quiet. The room is nice with an open style bathroom & wardrobe area and there are two sliding doors to cover it if you dont feel like being too expose. Breakfast is good with many choices of Indonesian & Western options. Staff are also helpful and attentive. Hope to be back here again.
title: An oasis in busy Seminyak

text:
My wife Frances and I have just returned to Melbourne after 10 nights at this beautiful hotel in Seminyak, Bali. This place has everything for it. Location to everything. The most beautiful pool we’ve ever been in with the most beautiful landscaping to compliment the setting. But most of all, the staff were amazing. Every single person genuinely cared about how we were enjoying our time there. They really did appreciate our comments and took every compliment as gold! The breakfast team were amazing and continually offering to assist in any way. Nothing was too much to ask. When my wife became I’ll from something odd on the street they were there for her, suggesting healthy things to help her recovery. The massages at the spa are second to none in Bali. The staff there were amazing including Eny and Martha and all of their team. Just do it. No need to go anywhere else.
Eka was always there when we went downstairs and took amazing care of us, as did everyone in the place. Yoga made us cocktails on the roof as we watched the sunset. He told us all about the joys in working in Bali and explained their situation during Covid when everyone was unemployed and had to survive unimaginable conditions while caring for their families. All credit to the Balinese people. Please trust my review and stay at Kanvaz Hotel in Seminyak.
title: This place is amazing!

text: From the check in to the check out everything was amazing. Stayed in lagoon access and loved it. Staff could not be anymore accommodating and so friendly.  Beautiful breakfast. Room was very clean and nothing was to much trouble for anything you needed.  Absolutely loved our stay here.  Already rebooked to stay again.
title: Amazing Hotel

text:
What a beautiful stay we had at Kanvaz. The staff were genuinely warm, friendly & at all times professional. The location is fantastic. Once inside the resort, it was peaceful & felt like home. The Kanvaz is virtually a brand new hotel due to opening during Covid. This was reflected in the comfortable & immaculately clean rooms & facilities. Everything was brand new. The complimentary breakfast was healthy & delicious, it would cover every type of dietary requirements. 
We had an opportunity to have some gorgeous treatments on the roof top spa. Affordable and heavenly. We enjoyed cocktails on the rooftop, what a lovely little oasis. The yoga room & gym facilities & pool all fantastic.
Love our stay at Kanvaz & will definitely be back.
title: Kanvaz, beautiful  boutique hotel.

text:
What an amazing service and food at the Tea Room. 
Especially Yudi  he was excellent.
Thank you for an amazing desserts .
We love this place.
Highly recommend this tea room and enjoy the food and desserts
title: Tea Room

text: Loved, Loved, Loved Kanvaz. The hotel was so new and the staff were wonderful. There is an amazing rooftop which is a true hidden gem. Our room was spacious and you must get a pool entry room. I felt special at the hotel and the boutique feel was welcoming. Also the hotel is in a great location.
title: Hidden gem

text: This is the first time I stayed at Kanvaz in Seminyak. All Staff were very friendly and efficient from reception to housekeeping to breakfast/restaurant staff. Be ready to be greeted by everyone you pass , even the gardener who maintains the beautiful gardens. The resort has a roof top bar that not many people know about. It is huge and accommodates chairs, lounges deck chairs and has a shallow pool. Our room was perfect .I honestly cannot fault this resort. Special mention to Ade at reception who was very accomodating to requests and always happy to assist in any way. Cannot wait to visit again soon.
title: Perfect holiday,  Luxurious Resort , friendly efficient staff. Cannot Fault

photos.caption: Pool area from deck chairs that sit in the water

text:
I was here for an annual meeting. I stayed in 2 different room type. The deluxe and then upgraded to the suite. 
First of all the hotel is so cute! It has the trendy minty and greentea green colour with bit of tosca here and there. You’ll be greeted with its famous pastry resto and its cute little boulangerie/pâtisserie/bistro. 

The Room:
DELUXE
 it was standard deluxe double beed room. Not that big but quite spacious. The amenities were complete. It has hairdryer and nice sandals :D I love me some good hotel sandals. 

SUITE
as usual, suite room always specta. It has its own living room. The bedroom is separated with a sliding door. 
It has direct access to pool, so it was nice :D
The amenities were complete up until the bathrobe and sewing kit. 
Ph and it has bath tub. 
You can put an extra bed in the living room, and it will still that spacious. 

The Ambiance: as it is in seminyak and the hotel is quite famous, so it was packed. But somehow not that noisy. Perhaps because my room was in the very end of the aisle. I always able to find good seat in the restaurant. 

The Food: it was good. Love it. They offered good bacon also :D 
The restaurant is quite large with lots of seating areas. 

However, I never keen with the pool that somehow connected to the resto. Because I don't like to be “stared at” while I was swimming and vice versa. IMO, you were not supposed to be disturbed with ppl swimming or playing in the pool here and there while you were enjoying your meal. Or being a bit annoyed when you were swimming or playing in the pool and ppl at the resto looking at the pool area 🤣
Unfortunately, this is how it was set up in this hotel. 
But anyway, it was personal preference. 

The Location: in Seminyak. So quite strategic even tho it is not that wide open in to the “wild” :) 
But still has easy access anywhere. And there are also kiosk nearby. 

The Price: it was not that affordable. But not that pricey like the Nusa Dua std hotel. So take a look at your budget, it it’s on your budget you should try this hotel. 

All in all, would defo recommend this hotel!  And try their pastries! So yumm!

@evatarida
title: Cute, Trendy, Nice Hotel at Seminyak

text: Located prominently along the main street, the hotel was hard to miss. Check in was excellent (Dewi/Dewa?), kept my luggage safe from morning till evening as room was not ready then. Loved the 'pool access' room where you could just pop in and out anytime you like. Deck chairs and towels available. Food options were excellent for both in room and at the restaurant. Customer service was excellent and quick. Everything I requested for (baby cot, extra pillows) were 'to the T'. Interesting movable walls to segment the bathroom from the main bedroom if required, but very essential when you have an already sleeping toddler while you need to wash up and prepare for the next day. Free parking available if you drive, breakfast was also included. Only wished I had gotten the larger room and stayed here from the start. We will be back Kanvas!
title: Should have stayed here from the start!

text: One of the best hotels in Seminyak area with cozy and nice rooms. Good buffet breakfast was a must daily thing to do. I stayed in lagoon pool room and it was best experience during my stay here. A pattiserie shop with range of sumptuous sweets will complete your day.

text:

title: A perfectly located gem in Seminyak

text:
I didn't actually stay at this spot, but popped in here for some lunch and cocktails several times on a recent trip.

The place is very appealing, clean, and stylish, great decor in the downstairs eating area which overlooks the pool. Well airconditioned and cool, great ambience.

Plenty to choose from on the menu, but i went for the toasted ham&cheese sandwhich which is different, not the normal type, but the cheese is on the outside, and its grilled and toasted, but TASTY!!

I visited the pool on the roof which has a bar and some very chill out seating, couches and a small shallow pool to relax in for some sunshine and good views. Cocktails 2-1 were great later in the day and about 4-5 to choose from.

The team here, including Sandi, were always helpful, and welcoming to the venue. Service with a smile! Thanks, ill be back for some cocktails on the roof sometime soon!

text:

text:
Really lucky that we found the hotel, it offered prime location in the heart of Seminyak, with all the popular places in Seminyak and Canggu nearby. At first, we were only attracted by the all Instagrammable spots and viral desserts by Vincent Nigita, but once checking in at the Lobby, we feel very relaxed and at ease.

Staffs were very helpful and friendly, rooms are clean with comfortable rooms, also breakfast stations, although compact, but all the yummiest things you'd crave for. We also love the rooftop, nice view with a beach-club vibe.

We stayed at the pool-access rooms, which are worth every penny. Overall, a very pleasant stay and we will definitely come back

text:
Thank you to the Kanvas staff for making the start of our Bali trip so enjoyable. The staff are beautiful, friendly and attentive. They made our stay very memorable.

The rooms are clean and well equipped. Recommended the pool access rooms to be able to lounge and swim whenever needed. The beds are really comfortable and we slept so well.

The restaurant area is beautiful and breakfast was delicious. Great omletes, coffee and friendly service. More than enough choices and we enjoyed every selection we tried.

Thanks again to Kanvas and in particular the staff. A friendly hello and smile everytime we saw them. We felt so welcome and would love to come back again soon.
title: Amazing staff

text:
If you don’t want to sit in traffic and worry about catching taxi’s to get around Kanvaz is the hotel to stay at, the location is perfect! You walk out and everything is right there.. I mean everything! From different restaurants, cafes, bars, boutiques, other shops for shopping, and also mini mart with ATM mechine is just accros the road.

The staff are always so accommodating and welcoming, nothing is ever too much or difficult to handle for the beautiful team here at Kanvaz.

Special mention to the beautiful Devi at the front desk, her customer service was seriously the best we’ve received anywhere we’ve travelled too. She was welcoming, professional and always went above and beyond to help us during our stay. 

My daughter was lost her phone in a taxi and I reached out to Devi for some help and she assisted us with no hesitation even tho we have checking out from Kanvaz. She helped us get the phone back !She done it quickly and we’re so grateful. 

Thank you for everything Devi
title: Love Kanvaz. Highly Recommended !

text:
Okay, so where should I start.

First of all, if you've never been to Bali, Seminyak ---where this hotel is located--- is one of the busiest areas in Bali. It's surrounded by cafes, restaurants, bars, and massage parlors. Not to mention the people. Who are basically well... everywhere. It's certainly a very lively place. But it can also overwhelm you sometimes.

This is why I believe Kanvaz is one of the best places to stay if you're in the area. From all of the glamour and chaos you encounter outside, this resort might just be the antidote.

The hotel itself is top-notch. When you enter you suddenly feel this sense of comfort and coziness. Maybe it's the light blue colors of the interior, the well-decorated restaurant in the lobby, or the delightful view of the pool placed in between the two main corridors. In Kanvaz, you feel that you are coming home to peace. 

If you like working and chilling on rooftops, this place is also for you. Come and see for yourself. But it will probably take a while for you to come back down.

The rooms are super clean and very comforting. No joke. I had the best sleep so far in the year while staying in Kanvaz. All rooms face the pool. And if you book the rooms on the first floor, your porch goes straight into the pool! Imagine that, a pool literally in front of your doorstep.

The food is also great. Try their Nasi Goreng from the restaurant, it will keep you coming back for more. Kanvaz is perhaps known for its patisserie - Kanvaz Pâtisserie by Vincent Nigita. Well folks, they truly lived up to the hype. I recommend you try their Pain Au Chocolat. Best Pain Au Chocolat for me hands down. My only two regrets about this are 1) they only have one store at the moment, and 2) I didn't buy more pastries :)

Bali is also known for the hospitality of its people. I might just say the same thing about this hotel. Everywhere you go you'll be greeted with warm greetings from its staff. They are all also super helpful. Most hotels, even the good ones in big cities usually are slow when you ask them for something. I was very surprised that the request I had at the time I was staying was delivered in next to no time to our room. 

I stayed in Kanvaz for our company retreat. We stayed for 3 nights and we rented their meeting room for 4 days. Trust me, if you're ever planning for a corporate gathering and require a place to host your team, book this hotel and meeting room right away. The meeting room is not your average meeting room. You won't be cooped up with no windows like most meeting rooms in other places. Their meeting room has a very good vibe with a fantastic view overlooking the pool. The perfect place to host your event and brainstorm with your team.

Last but certainly not least, I would like to express my thank you and gratitude specifically to Mba Dyan and Bli Rayi of Kanvaz. Mba Dyan has been super helpful for us from the start when we plan to bring our team to Kanvaz for the retreat all the way until we checked out. You can't find a more kind host who responds very fast and try to accommodate all of our requests in the best way than Mba Dyan. While Bli Rayi was our host for all of our meetings during the 4 days. I have to say, this gentleman is super sincere, helpful, and very accommodating. His hospitality is top-notch and certainly makes our life easier in organizing the meetings. It's not easy to cater to 30 people across 4 days, but Bli Ray went above and beyond to show what 5-star service is all about.

Definitely will come back here in the future!
title: Hidden Gem in the busy streets of Seminyak

text:
I 100% recommend staying at Kanvaz when you go to Seminyak. From the moment I walked in I knew it was going to be the perfect place to stay - it felt like our holiday home! I am fussy about hotels, and this was one of the best I have ever stayed at. 

Kanvaz is a brand new hotel, only a couple years old, and is located in the best part of Seminyak (in my opinion). The hotel feels luxe and sophisticated, and has stunning views of the pool from all angles. The hotel has its own adjoining patisserie with amazing pastries and macaroons. 

The staff were extremely helpful with bookings, room service, dry cleaning, and making sure we were taken care of every step of the way. I noticed a lot of maintenance being done during our stay (gardens, cleaning, painting etc) which was great to see the hotel being so well maintained. 

My friend and I particularly enjoyed the rooftop lounge/ pool which we spent every morning and afternoon sun baking and having cocktails. 

The rooms were extremely clean and comfortable with a balcony, separated toilet, luxurious linen, and mood lighting. 

Some of our local favourites around the hotel are as follows: 
- Gourmet (cafe, brunch, lunch, juices, coffee)
- Simply Brew (coffee)
- Kynd Community (cafe, brunch, coffee)
- Rayjin Teppanyaki Japanese (dinner)
- Al Diwan Lebanese (dinner)
- Body Works (spa) *make sure to book when you arrive as availability is limited 
-  Re Day Spa (spa) *make sure to book 

I would love to stay here again when I visit Bali because it was a special place. 

xx
title: 5 Star Luxury

text:
I stayed in a ground floor pool access room number 128 between 15th June and 22 June 2022. Check in was effortless and fast. The Kanvaz hotel is located in the heart of Seminyak which is some forty minutes away from the airport. The room I stayed in was immaculately prepared and because I booked direct, I was presented with a fresh fruit platter and welcome drink on arrival. The room spacious and had direct access to the amazing pool. The room was very well decorated in a contemporary design and visibly very little signs of wear. The toilet and shower were separate and partitioned with a glass wall. 
Housekeeping provided and replenished daily, complimentary lemon grass scented gels, soaps and sundries. Rooms on the ground floor have direct access to the pool, but the middle rooms particularly are overlooking the deepest bit of the pool, whereas the end suites have a shallower pool access  - I assume more suitable for families with young children. I noted that some of the rooms on the top floor, overlooking the pool, do not have a roof on the balcony so I imagine they can get hot at certain times of the day as there is no shade. However room 128 was perfect and smack bang in the middle of the pool. The pool itself is not very deep in any event and about 1.1m depth. Some reviewers mention issues with mosquitos, but in all the time I stayed, I had one mosquito in the room and if you ask housekeeping, they will spray the room with minimum fuss to eliminate and mitigate any unwanted pests. 
The beds and bedding were super comfortable and offer a variety of pillows. Breakfast is served in the main foyer overlooking the pool and there was a wide variety of dishes to choose from. There is fresh bread including charcoal soda bread, omellete station and fresh waffles available. Wi-Fi was fast and free, reliable and available all over the hotel even by the pool. 
In summary the Kanvaz was a real gem and I am so glad we found it. This city hotel is only a few years old but continues to be visibly very well maintained. The interiors are in a colonial style and have striking features and “Instagram” areas for photo opportunities. The onsite patisserie was exceptional with a fresh range of delicious and immaculately prepared cakes and pastries and also very reasonably priced. There is a roof bar and terrace, small gym and spa, albeit the Spa was running a reduced service owning to a shortage of therapists. There are no saunas. 
The staffs were particularly engaging and friendly and a big thank you to everyone who made us feel so welcome. It is evident that they really love their job and no request is too much to ask. 
There is a Circle K directly opposite the hotel if you need essentials and plenty of places to eat and change money nearby. The Shishi nightclub is a few minutes away too. Book the Kanvaz with confidence - you won't be disappointed!
The only minor compliant is that the pool waterfall needs to be timed better so that it it turned off at night as it can be quite distracting while trying to sleep, but as I said a minor issue.
title: Kanvaz totally can do!

text: We decided to look inside this delightfull Hotel whilst in Seminyak and decided to stay for lunch. The food was delicious and beautifully presented. text:
The first thing that I love about the hotel is simply the color, baby baby blue. The theme for being a boutique hotel is suitable for such a color, pleasing to the eye. The best part of the hotel is their infinite pool, it’s so long, it’s an infinite to me. I would highly recommend to go for the lagoon pool as the patio is literally directly accessed to the pool. The room was perfect and of course modern, fitting the style of the hotel. 

My favorite part was enjoying the Japanese Fan Dessert and their red tea, right in front of the infinity pool. Very relaxing. The breakfast buffet was amazing! I would love to see a waffle station as there was a pancake station. However, the scrambled eggs was perfect!

I would also like to thank, Dyan, for checking us in. She always give the best services when we were previously working together, she is always inspiring on giving the best hospitality services to all guests, it was nice to receive one as well. It was also a pleasure in speaking to Yuvie and Linda. Along with Mbak Eka, during breakfast, along with one employee from F&B who gave a short tour on the rooftop in the morning. Regardless, all the staffs were so friendly and welcoming, but most importantly, professional. 

I would definitely visit the hotel again and excited to enjoy not only the aesthetics,  pool, room and the delicious food but also other activities such as the spa, painting and many more.
title: This Artsy Boutique Hotel was very Aesthetically pleasing

owner_response.text:
Dear Premieresh,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.

First of all, let us assure you that there is no harm happened to any cat in the Hotel, and never will. We care about the cats, but at the same time we also need to keep the area clean.

Our concern was the left-over food you left on the floor of the corridor which not only attract cats, but also insects.

However, we would like to thank you for bringing it up to us, we need to care for the cats but at the same time need to keep the area clean. We have also training our team on how to communicate this to our guests.

Once again, thank you, and we hope we will see you again in the future.

Kind regards,

text:
My partner and i really enjoyed our stay at Kanvaz resort Seminyak. As a first timer in Bali, i did a bit of research into a good place to stay however Kanvaz exceeded my expectations once we arrived. 

Location: We choose to stay in Seminyak as we wanted a relaxing trip away from the crowd. Kanvaz is in such a great spot! Its super close to some great restaurants and coffee shops which are all a short walking distance or a quick taxi ride away. I was also surprised to find out how close it was to popular beach bars such as potato head and the W hotel  (literally right around the corner) which made our travels really quick and convenient. 

Room & amenities: The room was really clean and the bed comfy. Our room was always made up whilst having breakfast and turned down when we were out. Coming back to a made up room and sometimes with a tray of snacks and towel animal is always a nice touch. 
The free breakfast was a nice bonus, there is also a range of options to choose from with the addition of  a fruit and pastry bowl. The food provided by the hotel was so good and of high quality (coming from someone fussy about food) We probably had about 3-4 meals by the pool, breakfast everyday and a few room service orders. They have a good variety of food from their menu including tradition Indonesian options. 
The Hotel also has a nice rooftop bar and reflection pool (opened recently) a gym and a spa centre. I probably used the spa about 5+ times for a massage and also had a great pedicure there. Although they are more expensive than going outside of the hotel, the massages were really nice and they always have a monthly special on. 

Service: . A special mention to Ade & Devi who made our stay here extra special! All the staff here were really lovely and helpful. Ade booked a whole day trip for us to Nusa Penida (island nearby) at a great price, which was really appreciated as it took away all the stress and uncertainty away. We also had a late 11pm flight which we opted to have the late 6pm checkout. Ms Devi organised for us to stay even later until 8pm which was really kind. 

We really felt looked after here and will definitely be back on our next trip to Bali :) Thank you!!
title: Great stay!

owner_response.text:
Dear Mishywilson,

Thank you for a great review, we are happy to know that you and your partner had an enjoyable stay at our home. We are glad you enjoyed our rooftop lounge, Sky Bar Reflections, our amazing alfresco outlet The Terrace, as well as our Elemental Spa & Wellness and we are happy that you enjoyed the overall experience, our well-designed room, great location, and our a-la-carte curated breakfast. Thank you for recommending Ade and Devi, who is part of our lovely team, and rest assured that we will share your kind words with the team.  Please let us know if we can help organize your return trip to our home as we are looking forward to welcoming you back.

With best regards,
Kanvaz Resort Seminyak

text: My partner chose Kanvaz as it is new, clean and in a nice area and it did not disappoint!The hotel is very well presented always clean and all staff are super friendly in particular Ade on the front desk and front desk manager Devi! The food is spot on there and everything on the menu is delicious, the pool is so great to relax in, the roof top bar is great to chill in and the roof top spa is sensational and great priced! We also received 2 30min foot massage as they had the pool closed for a couple hours for cleaning which was in no way a problem and was more then compensated. Our flight was an 11:15pm flight and Kanvaz offers a 6pm late checkout and Devi being such a lovely lady allowed us to checkout at 8:30pm knowing our flight was a late one, they even drove us to the airport in their private car which was amazing too! We will definitely be staying here again on our next visit!

text:
This hotel exceeded my expectations in many ways. It’s only one year old so the facilities are new, modern and clean. 

Hotel staff are friendly and their is a great roooftop which has a shallow pool, bar, day spa and more. 

Rooms are spacious with good size beds and air con is cold. I had a top floor room which was great as I don’t like the swim up rooms as they lack privacy. Pool is massive and is open until 9 at night. Breaky is standard a la carte but is good if you don’t know your way around Bali. 

Best part about this hotel is its walking distance to so many great spots. 

My only recommendation to Kanvas is to update your pictures on all of the booking sites. They don’t do the place any justice.

text: We have just returned from 8 nights at Kanvaz Village Resort. We had a Lagoon Access Room and absolutely loved the pool. We had a room on the East Wing and found this room captured great sun through to the afternoon with shade in early morning which is great for sleeping. The standout with this resort is the amazing service of all staff. Customer satisfaction is high on the agenda here and nothing was ever too much trouble. The A La Carte Breakfast was excellent and staff were attentive and breakfast was always fresh and delicious with plenty of choices. We tried all dining venues and all are of an excellent standard if you dont want to leave the resort. Kanvaz is located walking distance from some fantastic restaurants our favourite being Sarong across the road which was exceptional and well priced. Miss Devi the Front Office Manager manages  a very efficient team and we were impressed at her willingness to assist with any/all requests. Would highly recommend for Couples as although there were children at the resort there presence on our visit was not intrusive. We look forward to a return visit soon.
title: Kanvaz - Beautiful Decor and Excellent Customer Service

text: We really enjoyed our short stay here. My husband and I (40yo) spent two nights here. We saw it being built a couple of years ago and wanted to visit when we came back. We couldn't find it on Google so booked The Dash Hotel up the road. We were looking for more luxury so moved from the Dash to Kanvas during our stay. There are 3 levels, pool level, middle floor and top floor. We chose pool level. You do give up some privacy but the pool access and private Sun lounges on your balcony really are nice. Also there isn't a huge amount of other lounges by the pool with shade so we were happy to pay extra. Staff were great, you get 1 free mini bar which was appreciated and the hotel is new, fresh and well built. Room service while a little expensive was yummy. We would recommend! If we can afford it next time we would prefer beachfront at Alila or Alila studios. But for the price we were very happy with Kanvas.

text:
I recently stayed at the Kanvaz. I arrived on Christmas Day and flew out on the evening of the 29th. The hotel itself is beautiful. Great layout and amenities. Room service was not only quick  but it was DELICIOUS! I highly recommend trying the traditional dishes that the hotel has to offer. The Cocktail list is great and each one we tried was SO GOOD! 
I really cant fault this hotel other than I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND securing a late checkout. I was informed via email it was subject to availability.  I had a flight leaving Bali at 10pm that night and was informed I had to leave the hotel at regular checkout time. I waited patiently in the hotels Terrace Restaurant for the majority of the day. Not once did any other guest enter the room I had occupied. This was very upsetting as it was so hot that day and that extra few hours to get sorted and settle prior to departing for the airport would have been fab! Unfortunately that wasn't too be. However, that's the only thing I can say was a let down. Other than that the hotel was lovely to stay at.
title: Beautiful Hotel

text:
We stayed here for 2 nights, 22nd to 24th Nov for our honeymoon/birthday. Hotel is very new, and the pool was the highlight of our stay. We stayed in a pool access room and spent most of our time enjoying the pool. The hotel has two wings, the east and west, so based on whether you prefer the morning or afternoon sun, you can make your booking accordingly. Afternoon sun lasts till about 3.30pm, and after that, the pool is in the shade. We did swim at night too, up till 10pm, and the water temperature was still very comfortable.  Although the placement of the hotel isn't the most perfect in terms of getting the sun all day, it didn't detract us from getting a decent tan either. Best time to be at the pool if you like the sun, is to hit the pool after breakfast, 10am to 3.30pm is the ideal timing to get the sun. 

We were very impressed with the quality of the breakfast here, much better than what we were expecting to be honest. It's Ala-carte, everything we ordered was very well presented and tasted very good. Staff at the restaurant were all very helpful, special mention to Jay, who was constantly checking up on us to make sure our meal was as comfortable as possible. 

Hotel is located in a very central location, with a mart just across the street if you need your drinks and snacks. They have staff outside the entrance of the hotel to stop traffic and help you get across the busy street if need be. Within walking distance are so many iconic eateries and also famous sunset drinking spots. We went for drinks at the Alila sunset bar, which took a casual stroll of 15 minutes. We also had dinner at Biku which is just a ten minutes walk away.

The only issue we encountered during our stay, was there was a slight sewerage smell coming from the drainage outlet located on the floor in our toilet. We bought an air freshener from the mart opposite the road and put it on outlet and that resolved the issue. Hopefully this issue can be looked into. 

Beds were comfortable, room was cleaned efficiently during our stay, and bottles of water readily provided on a daily basis. 

Overall, we had a very nice stay here, the reasonable price point, the pool access rooms, the quality of the food are certainly reasons enough for us to consider staying here again in the future! Hotel has good potential and headed in the right direction, do keep up the good work!
title: New hotel in prime central area

text: I had planned to stay in this ‘luxurious’ hotel for three nights to end my trip in Bali. On the first night we got BADLY attacked by bed bugs. We informed the front desk who gave us another room - a 10 min massage voucher as compensation, no apology from management despite having also emailed them directly. Devi - manager, never even bothered replying to us. “Outstanding” customer service they say... when we checked in to our new room, we lifted pillows and sheets and bedbugs were jumping everywhere. We took photo and video evidence, however they have tried to tell us those were not bedbugs, yet see photo below, we were badly bitten. I suggest you do not book this hotel for now as it seems they have an infestation. We asked to check out immediately and requested a refund, which they refused to give us back entirely. Unfortunately this took a toll on us, our bites were badly infected as they constantly itch and burn, this led us to a medical centre late at night!!! Think wisely before booking this hotel....
title: BEDBUGS!!!

text:
Kanvaz was incredible for our honeymoon stay with 11 month old baby. Everything was outstanding as per other reviews so I shall focus review on experience here with baby:
- all staff so sweet and friendly to our little one during stay 
- fantastic, clean nuna cot supplied for baby to sleep in as requested 
- prompt with any request: happy to put our bottle steriliser in kitchen microwave, prompt when asked to bring a high chair to dinner table, prompt when asked to bring high chair to hotel room when we decided to feed baby dinner in room 
- hotel or restaurant manager insisted on bringing over some cookies and bubaccino as a treat for the little one when we prepared meal 
- allowed us to order an item from
R u coco menu for baby to eat
- great shallow levels in the swimming pool for baby to stand, crawl and explore 
- pool gets great shade in afternoon which suited us protecting baby’s fair skin 
- if you need a kids club just a 5/10 min walk to Montigo you can pay as outside member 
- so many great places on foot nearby such as W hotel, spring spa, Bali gourmet catering for cheap bakery items for baby
- circle k opposite hotel, staff will help you cross road safely 
- we enjoyed using baby carrier best during our walks as footpath is not the best
- our favourite cafe hands down was a cheap Gojek to “nook” just 5 mins drive away wth fantastic food and view of rice fields. Also can recommend fat turtle (great prices) and bottega for Italian. So much at your fingertips in this location! 
Thankyou Kanvaz - rate it higher than the Sofitel Nusa Dua for service, friendliness and convenience!
title: Perfect for our honeymoon with baby

text:
So all in all I loved this hotel and our stay there! Below is a breakdown of the many good things and few improvements needed below:

The Good:
* Amazing location
* Beautiful friendly staff
* Affordable 5 star
* Fabulous facilities - pool, spa, gym, dining
* Comfortable bed and pillows
* Modern, new furnishings and decor
* Special shout out to Kaza restaurant it’s amazing!

Could be better:
*Not enough light in the room. Had to apply make up outdoors
*No drawers to put belongings away. They do have a small hanging area for limited clothes, but all in all not enough space for belongings.
*Breakfast seemed expensive for what we got. I would suggest ordering from the menu and not getting the package if you don’t eat a lot as this will be better priced!

Highly recommend spending a little bit more money and getting a pool access room. Having your own sun lounges and section of pool is really great!

Thank you Kanvaz!

Having recently stayed a Kanvaz for a short break I would recommend this property without hesitation. Unbelievable value for money, location was sensational and all food and beverages were prepared A la carte. 
Rooms are comfortable and I would opt for the pool access rooms on ground floor. 
We requested to move as the initial room did not have direct afternoon sun, not an issue for the team and we were relocated. 
Benefit of staying at Kanvaz puts you in walking distance to the best restaurants, beach clubs and premium shopping. 
Try Bambu, Batik, Seasalt and our favourite Lalucciola for a sunset cocktail and awesome Italian. Book before you go online or you won’t get in. 
Can’t wait to get back to Kanvaz and stay in the villas that are under construction.

text:
We had a two night stay in Kanvaz. I thought the hotel was well designed with all rooms facing the pool, and a lobby with great air circulation. The color scheme was pinterest-perfect, and the rooms spacious. It was easy to find taxi from the lobby, but the hotel itself is walking distance from all the famous f&b places in Seminyak.

Service in general was great, the staff were helpful throughout our stay, even late at night. They helped us send our excess luggage home and gave us pointers for bulk tableware stores. A little more attention should be paid to the cleanliness of the terraces, but the interior of the room was clean and well-supplied. They offered us water refills in the evening and the minibar was free.

Overall we would recommend this place for anyone seeking an affordable and aesthetic stay in petitenget.
title: Cute hotel in convenient location

I’d recommend paying the little extra for the lagoon access rooms, the pool is stunning. Rooms are very clean, and light and airy.
Noora (I hope that’s how it’s spelt) collected me from the airport, and gave me suggestions of things to do while here, he also then left me to snooze for the rest of the journey after a long travelling day.
Breakfast is tasty and again the team very friendly and love to make sure guests are happy. 
Thank you Kanvaz I will definitely return!!

We upgraded to a pool access room which id highly recommend as there’s not an awful amount of sunbeds around the edges of the pool. The room was beautiful, huge bed, gorgeous decor and big bathroom. They went the extra mile and made us a honeymoon cake and left flowers in our room, very thoughtful. The breakfast is insane you can order as much as you like from their al la carte menu and it was all delicious. Laundry service was very expensive we used somewhere local instead. All the staff were super friendly and couldnt enough for us. If you are leaving and have a late flight I’d recommend paying for late check out which includes transfer the the airport.

We can only say that ‚Kavaz‘ is absolutely a must not only in Seminyak but also in Bali. You will definitely be feeling home. Everything is very clean, all the staff very friendly and helpful and the food especially breakfast is a must to include in your booking otherwise you‘ll regret. Freshly prepared and healthy food...what do you want more next to a kind and very supportive staff like ‚Oka‘ who will be immediately for assistance should you wish something (thanks for everything). PS: please also try different cocktails at the Bar as they‘re amazing thanks to Kristian beside the coffee!! Super Barista!!!
Also, the Spa at Kanvaz is very recommended. We tried several massages but no one is so good like here. After needing to cancel another hotel due to bad conditions we felt Kanvaz to be the right place to be in order to saving the rest of our holidays. 
Kanvaz will make your stay more convenient, enjoyable and easy. 
Seminyak and Ubud are super places to be located as staging post from where you can access everything properly. Kanvaz will help you feeling Balinese home during your vacation, at the paradise on earth!

text:
Stayed at kanvaz village for 5 nights. Stunning hotel right in the hustle and bustle of seminyak. We were immediately greeted by lovely staff in the reception and  who offered us 2 welcome drinks and cold refreshing towels. They Immediately made us feel welcome and informed us of all of the services the hotel offered. 

Breakfast was really good. Wide assortment of options and you could order as much as you like. The banana pancakes and dragon fruit smoothie bowl is a  must. 

The location of the hotel is absolutely amazing.its in the centre of seminyak and so many brunch places and amazing restaurants and beach clubs are within walking distance. A few recommendations include sarong which is Indian food, coffee cartel, kynd community,the W hotel for drinks and sunset watching and the fat turtle,potato head. 

The pool of the hotel is long and spacious, however not as warm as you would like as the sun goes in after 14.30pm. More sun loungers are also needed as well. But apart from this nice clean pool. 

Room was clean and comfy and spacious. 

The Spa was good, good treatments offered, however slightly on the pricey side.

Overall excellent hotel in a prime location. Friendly service and deliver in all aspects. Definitely recommend. Thank you kanvaz for an enjoyable stay.
title: Great stay at kanvaz village

text:
My partner and I booked two nights at this hotel especially for my birthday, which was during the stay.

We had a lagoon access room and found it to be modern, clean and spacious. As the hotel is new, everything really is in great condition and we were impressed to find an extremely comfortable bed, great shower and strong wifi in the room. Unfortunately due to the layout of the hotel and the fact we were in the east wing, our balcony didn’t get any sun until the afternoon but as we were out and about we didn’t mind much. We were glad we had booked the lagoon access as sunbeds elsewhere by the pool are very limited.

We arrived early but were greeted by a welcome drink. The check in process was smooth and we left our bags with the hotel until we could access our room later in the day, by which time our bags were in the room waiting for us.

The staff were kind, friendly and attentive and even brought a birthday cake to the room and sang happy birthday for me!! One massive plus was that the minibar comes fully stocked with beer, soft drinks and chocolate bars which are all complimentary!

The breakfast comprises fruit, juice/tea/coffee, a bakery basket and a choice off the menu. My partner and I found all our choices to be delicious and well presented.

Thank you Kanvaz!
title: Birthday visit!

text: This resort is on the main drag (yet quite!) and pretty well positioned to everything Seminyak has to offer.  We used it as a base and walked to most places including Seminyak Square (15 minute easy walk) and the beach 5 minutes away.  The area felt very safe and the staff were so friendly with nothing ever a problem.  The food is good in the causal dining room near the pool but I would highly recommend dressing up and going to dinner at least one night at their restaurant (Kaza) upstairs - it's 5 star and not to be missed!  We stayed for 7 nights and they gave us free late check out (5:30pm).  I would have no hesitation in recommend this place to anyone.

text:
Room 327
Rate per night USD93 include breakfast 
Booked through Agoda for 3 nights

We had a good experience staying here, started from the quick check in/out process, the whole staff were very nice and kind. They’re really welcoming us.
The hotel is located at the central Seminyak and it’s surrounded by the good restaurant/cafe. They’re really close from Kanvaz, it’s walking distance. My recommendations will be Biku (Bali traditional), Rivareno Gelato, Dough Darlings (Doughnuts & Coffee) and Pison (Local & Western). 
Another good things from Kanvaz, this hotel still new i believe, the room has modern design, quite spacey & clean, and also the balcony with pool view was great. I think their swimming pool was one of the best in Seminyak hotels. And my favorite part was on breakfast time, they didn’t provide you buffet, but they come with very delicious a la carte both local/western breakfast. Most of them had a perfect taste and quite big portion. If you still hungry, you may have another portion also.
The only drawbacks of Kanvaz were the traffic jam to/from the hotel, understood it’s because they’re located at the central of Seminyak. 
That’s all i can share!

Regards,
Erlangga
title: Pleasant stay

text:
We originally booked accommodation elsewhere and had multiple issues so we decided to leave after only one hour and chose Kanvaz to accommodate us for our final 4 nights in Bali. 
Absolutely stunning hotel, the foyer is like something out of a magazine, beautiful double doors, individual reception desks which is something you would expect in a boutique hotel in Sydney. Staff were super welcoming on arrival, even arranging our bags to be brought to the room for us. 
The rooms were very nice, brand new and felt very luxurious. The lush towels, glass bottled water, complimentary one time mini bar use, and beautifully scented amenities made us feel well looked after. The pool is also stunning, however limited pool chairs. Some advice to the hotel - please look into removing the cushions from the pool chairs overnight, as they were very damp and not nice to lay on in the morning. 
The resort hasn’t been fully completed yet so the day spa is still being renovated, as is the rooftop bar. The dining options are very expensive, but who eats at the hotel anyway with amazing restaurants all over Seminyak! 
Be sure to check other websites for prices though, we used booking.com and spent only $612AUD for 4 nights, usually the hotel’s direct website is cheapest but for the same room the price was just under $800AUD. 🤷🏽‍♂️
title: Saved by Kanvaz!

owner_response.text:
Dear  Jordan, 

Thank you very much for your wonderful comments and we are glad to know that you had such a wonderful time at our new home. Indeed the design and aesthetic appeal, the spacious room and our 100m pool help us make a great guest experience. text:
We booked our stay here based on Trip Advisor reviews and it hasn’t disappointed. 
We hadn’t booked a pool access room but decided to upgrade when we arrived which was super easy. Glad we did because like some of the reviews say, the sun lounges are fairly limited otherwise and it’s definitely nice to look out to the pool and have the convenience of your room right there instead of setting up downstairs for the day to use pool. Also makes coming and going very easy without any lifts involved. 
The pool side rooms only get sun either in morning or afternoon though depending which side you are on. 
Lovely and clean, staff very attentive and friendly. 
Breakfast is pretty good, it’s not buffet style but they have a fairly good selection on a menu and it’s all you can eat.
We were lucky to be here when the spa just opened on the roof top so they’re offering half price treatments until end of month and they are aaamazing! We have had massages every day and highly recommend. 
My waxing experience wasn’t so great. They don’t have the lighting required to achieve the best result but that’s ok when it was half price. 
Gym equipment is limited but great to have one available and can make do with what’s there.
Fantastic location, short walking distance to some of our fave sunset spots and plenty of shopping opportunities nearby. 
Thank you Kanvaz Village Resort for a lovely stay!

text: My partner and I had booked this accommodation for a recent trip that we had planned after searching high and low on booking websites. We were drawn to this accommodation after reading the glowing reviews, in particular regard to their outstanding customer service. However, our trip was just not meant to be. Unfortunately after attending at the airport to catch our flights early on a Sunday morning, we were advised that we would not be able to travel due to having only 5 months expiry on my passport (apparently you need at least 6 months to enter Bali!!). After the bitter disappointment of hearing that we could not travel, we did all we could to explore our options. We knew that whatever options we had would be further delayed as our flight was booked on a Sunday morning. We contacted the passport information line as soon as it opened and received further disappointing news. We were advised that we could place an application for a priority passport that would not be guaranteed to arrive prior to close of business on Wednesday. This option would also cost $500! Our holiday was only meant to be small one due to my employment and only being able to book a small break, so our return flight was due to come back on the Sunday. Weighing up our options, we accepted our fate and sadly decided that Bali was just not meant to happen this time round. We contacted Kanvaz straight away to explain the situation and see if there was anything that they would be willing to do. As we were aware that this was entirely our fault, we did not expect that a full refund would be given. Kanvaz informed us that we would need to contact Agoda, the website that we booked through to discuss the situation with them. After back and forth communication with Agoda and Kanvaz for 9-10 days, we have now been formally advised that we are not entitled to any form of refund or credit. This comes as incredibly disappointing news as we had paid for 6 nights’ accommodation and had already commenced planning a Bali trip for the upcoming New Year period. Further to this, my father and his wife live in Bali and if we had been aware that any form of refund or credit was never going to be an option, we would have allowed them to utilise the accommodation so it would not go to waste. We are aware that the situation was our fault entirely; however, given the lack of empathy for our situation and the lack of customer service that was received by Kanvaz, we are no longer feeling confident in booking this accommodation again. Returning to my workplace has gone from me originally saying how excited I was to stay within the accommodation, to sharing my disappointment in the lack of gesture and good will that was displayed by Kanvaz and their staff. Very disappointing travel experience over all.
title: Very disappointing experience

owner_response.text:
dear bethanygiles,

Thank you very much for your plan to visit and choose our new home in Bali base on our previous fellow members review on Tripadvisor. We were very concerned that you were not able to visit us due to the expiration date of your passport and realized it upon your departure date on August 11th, 2019, as in our system it automatically posted as no show guest. As you may know, we do have an agreement with your online travel agent that your booking is nonrefundable if the guest do not show up on the confirmed arrival date without prior notification. We apologize that we could not grant your request, as we have a certain policy to adhere to. However, we would have been happy to receive your family in Bali should you informed us this preference

We hope that despite your disappointment, you would give us the opportunity to welcoming you in the near future and please do contact us and we will ensure to look after the arrangements for you and your partner visit.

With best regards,

text:
During my trip to Bali July 26- August 7 recently , myself and two close friends had to seek alternative accommodation as a Villa we had pre booked wasn’t quite as it was advertised. 
However, after my stay at Kanvaz, it turned out to be a blessing , as we were all so happy with the service we’d received during our stay.

The rooms were on point , clean , serviced everyday and the bed super comfy!
The hotel had an amazing pool where we had all spent a lot of time during the stay , pool side service also kept us very happy throughout the days!

The team at Kanvaz we’re incredibly friendly , but a well trained team must have a good leader , and we had the pleasure of meeting Devi the Opp’s Manager who is evidently a stand out in Bali in the hospitality industry. Devi assisted with bikes for hire , extended our stay at more than competitive rates , and even offered help for me with some of her staff to visit a police station when I had a small issue with  some stolen property. 
Nothing was too much trouble for Devi and the team, and I am certain anyone considering visiting Kanvaz won’t be disappointed. 
Additionally, the hotel location is in a great spot in Seminyak, away from the traffic jams , but close to all of the great food and coffee spots in the area.

I won’t hesitate returning to Hotel Kanvaz and planning to do so in December this year.

Well done to Devi and the entire Kanvaz crew for making our stay incredibly enjoyable.
title: An amazing stay at Kanvaz!

text: Spent 8 nights in a pool access room.On the 1st morning went to pool terrace for an early swim before breakfast. Left leg slipped on slippery tiles at entrance to pool,to prevent falling backwards and smashing my head, i planted my right foot and smashed my right knee.These rooms have no slip resistant tiles, no handrail, no step ladder to enter pool and no warning signs. Holiday ruined, tours cancelled and spent 9 days in my room. I was operated on my return home and spent 3  weeks resting.I informed 3 members of staff(incl mgr Devi) but there was no interest. This holiday put me back nearly $7000 aud with holiday and medical costs.I emailed Devi to request some compensation but she refused. This place is new but it appears to do everything on the cheap.Devi gushes all over everybody but when there is a problem she disappears.Breakfast buffet was cancelled due to too much waste according to one staff member.The A La Carte was limited and I don't go on holiday to eat the same breakfast everyday. The Restaurant is leased out and empty every lunch and dinner time. There is no bar and how many days can you sit and look at the pool. I cannot  recommend Kanvaz for your next holiday. All goes well here until there is a problem and then you are well and truly on your own.
title: Dangerous

owner_response.text:
Dear Marjorie S,

First of all, we would like to thank you for giving us a 5-star rating and sharing your view with the fellow members of Tripadvisor upon check out in end of June 2019. However, we are very concerned reading  your opposite review on the same platform on 9th August regarding the service of our manager Devi. We have received many positive comments relating to her service to providing exceptional guest experience and we are disappointed to hear that you did not share the same view.  

We apologize that we could not grant a free stay compensation as you requested via email to Devi after your departure, as we have certain claim policy to be adhered to. It was explained in her reply email on 24th July.

We were very concerned and fully empathized with the injury occurred during your stay, therefore to reassure our guests of our dedication to their complete comfort and well-being we offered you our service recovery efforts during your stay, but you preferred to manage the situation personally. If we have the chance to welcome you again please let us know if anything whatsoever does not meet your satisfaction while you were in residence and we will immediately rectify the situation

We hope that despite your disappointment, you would give us the opportunity to welcoming you back in the near future and please do contact us and we will ensure to look after the arrangements for your return visit.

text:
If you want to experience luxury at its finest with a handful of humility then you are at the right place..!

Where to start...., I had booked this place for my cousin who decided to travel before me to Bali. He stayed at the Hotel and he was in 'awe' and couldn't stop talking about how wonderful it is and how everyone is making him feel at ease. 

When he told staff that he has relatives flying over, they didn't hesitate to help with the booking experience.

I contacted the front office manager, Devi Anggraini and told her that we are interested in a room, and I didn't have to worry any further. Top rooms were selected for my family and I, and the magical experience started to manifest from there. She deserves so much for what she has done for us. Because of that alone we are flying back and are already preparing our trip..!! 

I must say, Chapeau! to their architect. His insight on room detailing is amazing. You can make use of the different services in the room e.g. bathroom / toilet without disturbing others, especially when it comes to turning on the lights. 

Did I tell you that their car-service is to be recommended. Your identity is respected. No old-fashioned name-board/paper.  Privacy at its finest -:) How they do it, I guess you need to find out yourselves -:)

I am short for words.  My experience was like walking on rose petals every day..! 

The staff..!!! I called them Mini-Angels. The EPITOME of excellent service..!!! 

Gosh, my experience from a scale from 0 (horrible) to 10 (excellent) was a 17..!!! Everything was just perfect. 

Clap, clap for the chef, food was good good good and oh so freshly made..! 

Staying here reminds me of the song in the Aladdin movie, 'a whole new world'.
I am happy to have experienced a whole new world here at Kanvaz..!

Thank you very much Devi and your magnificent team..!!!

xoxo
title: M A G I C A L - Foregleam of Paradise..!!

text:
I booked Kanvaz for 6 nights with my 19 year old daughter. I will summarise the review for ease of reading as I find some things people don't care about and others are super important to them, so you can go straight to the area that's important to you.

1. Rooms/ Facilities 8/10. (would score higher if the rooftop pool and bar was finished )
I booked a lagoon access room - we were in West Wing 127. Great rooms as they are only 7 months old. Big seperate shower and seperate toilet with glass doors to both , large king bed and a small desk with chair and tv until on wall. Small verandah to the pool with 2 sun lounges. The room was perfect for what we needed. You don't get a lot of sun in the pool during the day which wasn't a huge deal as we were out for a good part of each day but learned the best time to go swimming was in the morning when you get the sun. They are building a rooftop pool and bar which will solve this small issue. We were both super glad we booked this room  - it is gapped value for money compared to other surrounding 5 star properties that were double the price.
There is work going on the rooftop (new bar and pool) and construction going on both sides of the hotel. The hotel were very receptive to take feedback on board and if the noise became too much they offered small gestures to apologise and if the workers went overtime the staff ensured they stopped. It was difficult for them to control the work next door which is understandable. I think once the rooftop bar and pool and spa is complete this property will have everything you need in a destination. The morning of the aftershock that was scaled at a 6 - shook the building and trees but I was thankful not to be on the water, The beach is about a 8 minute walk around the bend to the right out of hotel. I think it would have been nice to have happy hour longer to encourage people to come out to the bar /pool area and mingle.

2. Location 10/10
We felt the location was perfect Turn right out of he property and Its a 9 minute walk to Potato Head and Woo Bar at the W, 10 minute walk around a bend and past shops to Sea Circus and a ew other bars and a further 5 minutes further around from sea Circus to Motel Mexicola, Bodyworls (Spa) and Seminyak village and Square. Note Seminyak village is a two level shopping mall, Seminyak square is a square with some undercover shops and some open air market stalls - it isn't big but its where we purchased some sun dresses for about $10 each.  If you turn left out of the property and walk the other way you head towards Kerobokan JL where Mama San is but most things in that direction for us involved a Blue Bird Taxi.

3. Service  - 8/10
If this is your number one priority then I have mixed feelings here. Generally the staff were very good and the Front Office Manager (Devi) was very accommodating and eager to please. Some of the staff were a little vague when we asked questions of where things were with the exception of Rini - she was amazing and helpful with suggestions and bookings. the security staff out the front were helpful in stopping the traffic if you wanted to cross over and get money out of the ATM from the K supermarket. The ground staff also always said hello and appeared happy to be there!

4. Food/ Breakfast 10/10
A highlight for us. An A La Carte menu for breakfast which had smaller smaller style plates pr bigger breakfasts. The local favourites like Nasi Goreng was amongst the best we had the whole 10 days. Breakfast really was creative and tasted amazing and was included in the rate we paid.  I preferred this way of eating as we didn't overeat in the morning which you can do with buffets. The room service was tasty and reasonably priced. 

All up we would stay at Kanvaz again and were super happy with our choice. After leaving Kanvaz we headed to Ubud and really missed our breakfasts at Kanvaz and our room ..... I look forward to seeing how the rooftop and bar looks.

I paid for airport transfer which I believe is included if you book direct (which we didn't). The From office Manager was very kind on organising our transfer to Ubud complimentary and also a bottle of bubbles in our room to apologise for the noise which was very much appreciated!!
title: Stylish property, lagoon access pool rooms, Unbelievable Breakfasts

text:
We wanted to spend sometimein Seminyak, after spending the first week in Nusa Dua.  Even though Nusa Dua is our favourite place (clean, spacious) the Kanvaz was a brilliant hotel, with really nice setting, great restaurant and pool, really friendly and helpful staff, and the food was the best we had in Bali.  
Price was not cheap, but well worth spending a few hundred dollars more for the pool access room, and cheaper than the place we stayed in at Nusa Dua. breakfast was fantastic, and you could easily chill out for a few hours with a great view of the hotel.
Lots of selection of other eateries nearby of all qualities, from the best in Seminyak to some cheap options. Reasonably close to Bodyworks (for a wonderful massage) 5-10min walk, or the Hotel will drop you off their for an appointment for free, or a bit longer (15mins) to Seminyak Square.  places like Potato Head Club was 5min walk away.
title: Great place to stay in Seminyak - we will be back
