text:
This gorgeous boutique hotel was a delight the moment I stepped foot into their ‘duck egg blue’ atrium for check-in. It is styled beautifully, and gives off a sophisticated Hampton’s vibe. 

Just beyond the atrium is the dining area, which opens out to the pool, that runs the length of the resort.  Rooms are on each side and has three (3) levels. 

ROOMS
The colour tone of the rooms are neutral and calming. Nothing in your face and all minimal with plenty of space. You will find a carry bag with your pool towels in the room. 
BONUS - On arrival, all rooms are stocked with a once off complementary mini bar - Bintang’s, soft drinks and snacks!!!!  Such a nice touch after coming in off a flight.

Premier Sunshine - Located on the 3rd floor and the balcony gets sun all day. On the balcony is a small table and a couple of chairs. 

Premier Balcony - Located on the 2nd floor. Depending on which side of the hotel you are on, is depending on if you get morning sun or afternoon sun. These balconies have a daybed, table and chair. 
This is the room type I stayed in and I was extremely happy with the size, layout, bedding etc.  I was actually in an ‘interconnecting’ room. Just to note, their interconnecting rooms, connect via a door on the balcony. Not through the room. 

Lagoon Pool - Located on the bottoms floor and have access directly to the pool. No sun, but have the convenience of stepping straight into the water from your room. Great for a late night swim!

Suites - I did view the Lagoon Suite, which as per the name, gives guest access direct to the pool!  The 2 Lagoon Suites would be awesome for friends travelling together to have, as the pool they access is kind of a seperate pool to the main one. Anyway the suites are a good size with a bedroom (inc sofa) and a seperate living area as well as a balcony. 

POOL
The pool runs the length of the resort, so it only gets sun up until about 3pm - great for people that like to actually swim. Lounges are located either on your patio (if you have pool access) or at each end of the pool which are limited. Restaurant end there is a handful and at the opposite end you will find a few more which are all sitting in shallow water - great to cool yourself down by putting a foot or hand in. Just need to watch that a phone doesn’t accidentally fall in! 😱

FOOD
Breakfast - One word...AMAZING!  I have always loved the an al a carte breakfast - order what I want, food isn’t sitting around and there is no wastage. There is no Buffett here and don’t expect a massive menu, but what is on the menu is perfect (I thought it was anyway). You are served with fresh pastries and a bowl of fruit. Then they will take your coffee order + food order. 

R U CoCo - Best value for money!!!  Food is quick, clean eating and delicious. Price is so cheap!

STAFF
Restaurant staff are so happy and friendly and reception are super helpful. Security are happy and friendly. 
Special shout out to the Front Office manager Devi - exceptional service, thank you. 

LOCATION
Locations keep getting pushed further and further north towards Canggu. I think it is a great location. Still in easy access to crazy, but removed enough from it. In between eat street and Canggu (closer to eat st). 
Great restaurants all around, money changer and convenience store across the road. 

Parents with young children...unless they are super well behaved, keep clear. Excitable children their high pitched voices just bounce off and echo all the way through the resort - horrible!!!!  

Full disclosure - Until they complete the rooftop, there will be noise from the building during the day, but times are random. This didn’t take away from the resort as a whole - I love this place!!!!!

Thanks to all the staff and management!
title: Duck Egg Blue

owner_response.text:
Dear Bianca_25_Rose

Thank you for writing and sharing your detail review of Kanvaz Resort Seminyak with fellow members of TripAdvisor. We are delighted to have hosted you at our new home and very happy to know that you enjoyed your stay overall. Indeed the design aesthetics of the resort coupled with good services, strategic location, great breakfast and various food and beverage curated offerings, all adds to the overall experience and help us make a charming home for our guests.

The "duck egg" blue atrium was named "Blue Robin", a Siberian bird which migrates annually across to and are welcome to settle in Indonesian forests. They lay eggs of greenish-blue color which inspired our glass atrium color where we welcome arriving guests from different countries with Indonesian hospitality. 

We are happy to know that you enjoyed our a-la carte degustation breakfast menus and our newly open RU Coco Asian Bistro. We are glad reading such an amazing compliment as it goes along way in ensuring we continue to serve the best produce in each of our FnB outlets, using fresh ingredients sourced by our culinary team from local food artisans and farmers. 

We appreciate your acknowledgment of our staff and service being friendly and helpful. Indeed the team here does an amazing work and thanks for recommending them. Rest assured that we have shared your comments with Devi and the entire team in the meantime.

We will soon have our rooftop facilities up and running and can't wait to welcome you back home and surprise you on your return visit. 

With best regards,
Kanvaz Resort Seminyak

text: This place is new, cozy, and provides exceptional service in all categories. The front desk manager Devi took care of all our needs, and even provided us with a cake, and rose petals for our anniversary free of charge. The food, and drinks matches the quality of service they provide. The rooms are perfectly sized, and beds are comfortable with very HOT water available. We had the pool room which provided us direct access to the pool from our room, it was great. We've stayed in larger resorts such as Mulia, Rimba to name a few, but this place provides much more of a personal service that the larger resorts simply can't provide. They have hired the best of the best in the food and hospitality industry. If your looking for a CLASSY, and COZY place to stay that is perfectly located in Seminyak, this place is for you. I can see 1 gripe someone may complain about, and that you may hear some noise from the pool area from time to time from children. It didn't bother us at all, because by the time any children started swimming it was time to have breakfast anyways. We only heard some kids 1 day, as most people that stay here seemed to be more couples than families. Did I mention the free mini bar in the rooms? We will definitely stay here again, as it is our new home away from home.
title: Exceptional location, and service. Perfect location to explore Seminyak.

text: I booked this hotel because of the good reviews but it was the worst decision of my travel to Bali. The check in was extremely slow, I do not know what they were doing or waiting for, once we went to our room, everything was pretty and cozy, they even prepared a cake for us until we realized that the cake had little presents all around...It was full of ants everywhere and they where in all the room, something disgusting and it is non-acceptable for a 5 stars hotel, honestly DISGUSTING!!! We left the room and contacted with the staff because we did not want to stay in that room one more second, we went to the lobby to wait for a solution, they were preparing another room that took 25 min to be ready (so at the end we decided to leave the suitcases in the lobby and go to have food in the city). By the way, we never received a sincere apology from anybody in the hotel. When we came back to the hotel, we thought that we will get an upgrade after this bad experience (like all the 4-5 stars hotels do) but no, exactly same room...you just breath and let it go. We went into our new room, we got comfortable, took a shower and when we were ready to use the hairdryer...this was full of hairrrrr, againnn disgusting. At this point, it was late and we just gave up with this hotel. The breakfast is a menu breakfast, very simple, nothing especial if you compare with other places, I rather to go to have breakfast to the restaurants that are close by. Last day, they allowed us to do a late check out, also I was sick and feeling very bad so I decided to stay in the hotel sleeping but from reception, they decided that was a good idea to call to ask how was everything instead of letting me rest and ask that question when we will do the check out. Also, they cancelled the access to our room before we did the check out so we had to go to reception to complain and allow us to go inside our room (again...we never got an apology) The shuttle bus to the airport is 350000 ruphias when you are 20 min away from the airport and with gojet (kind of Uber in Bali) is less than 100000. Also, the walls were very thin, you could hear the TV from the other rooms all the time. They almost ruined our honey moon but thankfully we had a great experience at another 5 star hotel. Definitely, I will never go back to this place, horrible from the beginning to the end.
title: Ant-Room (Nasty and disgusting experience)

text:
Flight got cancelled (yippee!) so needed accommodation for extra 2 nights. 
Newly opened in Jan 2019 so thought we’d try it out. 
If you are wanting a hotel that you can sit by the pool all day in the SUN then this ISN’T the hotel for you. I find it frustrating for a new hotel build in a destination where guests potentially may want to relax by the pool all day in the sun, the developers got the layout of this hotel very wrong. 
Sun lounges only in sun from 9.30am - 2.45pm and no bar service. 
We paid extra to have a lagoon room which gave us walk-in access to the pool, which was great. 
Rooms - limited bottled water, very small in size, aircon touch and go, a whirling noise which I think is from the aircon drones all night and very annoying.
Location - great location with easy walking distance to Seminyak fantastic restaurants and shopping. 
Staff - friendly and very accommodating. 
Apart from the sun issue, I’m sure the rest are just teething issues. 

Also note that construction on the top level of this hotel AND a new building next door  have just started, so noisy from around 8.30am until 5pm.
title: Not a hotel you can sit by the pool all day in the sun

We loved our stay at this beautiful boutique hotel. Rooms are amazing, decor and design is next level. Comfy bed and lovely bathroom. We stayed in a pool access room. Hotel is in great location with circle K $ changer, salons and great dining options close by. Al a Carte breakfast was top notch- see photos. Nothing was too much trouble for staff or Devi. Can’t wait to return.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stumbled across this 4 month old gem after being ripped off at a nearby resort who refused to deliver pool access rooms as booked. There were no problems at Kanvaz with Devi and staff looking after our group of 3 couples like royalty when we moved resorts. The rooms are well laid out around the stunning pool. We had pool access rooms and these have large landing/ deck areas with 2 deck chairs. Breakfast was al a carte with great choices, complimentary fruit bowl, juices, pastries and coffees, very relaxing environment. The first nights mini bar contents were complimentary. This resort is well located with plenty of restaurants, including the high class meri puti next door, W hotel and potatoe head within 100m, also money exchange and choice of spas nearby. I hired a scooter and parked it in the underground car park no problem. We were also given complimentary airport transfers at the end of our stay. we really loved this place and it will be enhanced when their rooftop bar, restaurant and gym is completed in the next few months, although these weren't missed by us. The staff are an asset, all friendly and helpful, which is not always the case in resorts in Asia.
My only suggestion was to provide drinking glasses as standard in the rooms as well as a freezer for ice. I'm sure these were available on request.
title: Fantastic new hotel

owner_response.text:

text: I was a bit hesitant to stay at Kanvaz since it is still very new and there were not enough reviews or photos of the place. The hotel looks better than the actual photos posted online. We have stayed in a suite lagoon. It was so stylish, spacious and extremely clean! Massive bedroom with a walk in sectioned wardrobe. The toilet, bath and shower are all separated which made getting ready twice as fast and using the bath twice as fun. Housekeeping gave the room the wow factor everyday. Felt like we were checking in everyday over and over again. For lazy night's we ate at their restaurant where the food was also 10/10. The location is very convenient and few minutes walk to all cafes and pubs bars etc.. Or the friendly staff at the front desk could organise a safe taxi for you in minutes. Overall nice and clean hotel in a good location very helpful,friendly and nice staff and A BIG THANK YOU to Devi who went the extra mile to look after us and make us feel welcome and comfortable!

text:
We recently stayed for 4 nights at Kanvas and wished we could've stayed longer! We were greeted by the most welcoming & friendly staff, including manager Devi, who also organised a surprise gluten free birthday cake for my partner who is coeliac. 

We stayed in the lagoon access room, which was modern and very clean with great aircon. The direct access to the pool felt very private & luxurious! We would highly recommend staying in this room!

The service was class! Staff greeted us every time we walked past & were extremely happy & helpful to answer any questions. Their breakfast is al a cart with delicious options & they also went out of their way to make sure my partner had gluten free options.

The location is absolutely perfect, within walking distance to all the best shops & restaurants as well as the beach. 

We can't wait to come back!
title: 6 star stay!

Dear Dean B

Thank you very much for taking the time to give your opinion on our Home. 

Wow 6 star that is an amazing comment that all the family was pleased and happy to read.

We do try to welcome our guests all as a part of the family and as so when you have one family member that is intolerant to any kind of type of food you do your best for him not to feel excluded because of this issue. Thats why we went a step further doing all the best we can to ensure full happiness with a real food range accessible. There is nothing worse than a place you go and as a vegetarian you get the only "mixed overcooked veggies" or intolerant to gluten having only 2 or 3 items available and looking at your friend plate that looks amazing.

Don't hesitate to contact Devi or myself for your next stay in Bali and we will welcome you back even with more facilities opened.

Kind Regards

text:
From the time I arrived until the time I left (two days ago), the experience was nothing short of amazing.  I just returned home after a month in Bali and was so glad I ended my stay 6 night stay in Bali at KANVAZ.  It dictated for me what Balinese hospitality and service is all about.  Not to mention the beautiful hotel with it's appealing decor, design, pool, and set up. I felt so lucky to have found this place and guarantee that if you are looking at this as an option, you'll be glad you chose it.

The location is just perfect.  You're kind of in the middle between two busy and congested sections in the area.  Easy to walk into either direction for eateries, shops and businesses.

The staff at the KANVAZ are the best.  I fell in love with everyone who works there.  I miss them.  They made me feel I was the only guest there.  That's service for you.  Coming from a business where I give service to my clients, I know what I'm talking about.

Should I come back to Seminyak, I will look nowhere else but just book at the KANVAZ!

text: Just arrived home for an amazing stay at Kanvaz hotel, Seminyak. Prior to departing Melbourne, my partner and I had booked our accommodation elsewhere for the duration of our holiday. We walked past Kanvaz on the fourth day of our trip and decided to check out the facilities, rooms and meet with the staff. We were so impressed that we decided to move to hotels! Staff are lovely and go above and beyond for their clientele. So much so that the Hotel Manager Devi organised our transfers and accommodation for a four night stay in Ubud in the middle of our trip! The hotel is super close to the best restaurants; including Sarong and Merah Putih. Rooms are gloriously clean, entrance and meals area is ornately decorated, and the facilities are not too far off completion. Would highly recommend and will most definitely be back soon!
title: Beyond amazing experience & stay!

Hope you are now fully in shape to get back to work.

text:
Check in was long even though it was after 2pm. Took at least 20 mins. I was waiting there
not knowing why it took so long. Rm 277 which we eventually moved to 278 as the TV and air condition were not working. Took at least 45mins before we initiated for a room change. Tired of waiting and talking on problems not resolved. No internet password provided for in the room nor it was given to us while we were escorted to the room. Have to call to ask for it. Checking out again took another 15 to 20 mins for housekeeping to check the room. 
Crippling thing is, this place even though it is new and all the rave reviews, is still under renovation and full of paint smell. We have to open the balcony door whenever we are in the room. See those rooms opposite mine, all newly renovated. Even the corridor is under some patch work. If we were to test the particulate per sqm in the room, will it stand up to the test?
title: Rather disappointing stay

owner_response.text:
Dear timtok1212

Thank you for your feedback that is definitely very embarrassing for myself and for our Kanvaz family team members especially when it comes several days after your stay instead of when you are actually in house and we can fix issues.

I have to say that from the beginning to the end you were quite unfortunate and had a sum of little things that piled up   creates a disappointing stay.
As you mentioned it we just opened and still have some issues on internal process that requires to be tuned up.

I do apologise for it and be sure that all the actions have already been taken in order not to have those kind of issues in the future.

Do not hesitate to contact me next time you are in Bali, I will make sure personally that your eventual stay with us would be followed by a similar feedback as the other reviewers.

Kind Regards

Jerome TAILLARD
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We booked the Lagoon Suite at Kanvaz very last minute (due to a flight cancelation). We stayed at this resort for 3 nights and had a great time.

The room we had was huge! It was very clean and nicely decorated. The bed was fantastic, very comfortable! The pool was nice and we had access from our ground floor suite with just a few steps from our room to the pool. The breakfast was very delicious, the staff were lovely.

This is a fairly new hotel so not all the facilities were available just yet, but that didn’t affect our trip at all!

Great location, very close to everything. Short walk to Potato Head, W and other great beach bars.

This resort is not huge like some of the surrounding hotels but its very nice for couples and I would recommend it to friends.

I look forward to returning on our next trip to see the hotel in full swing!
title: Beautiful cosy resort.

Thank you for your kind comments on our home and on our Kanvaz Family members.

We are looking forward to see you back to your Balinese home.

Kind Regards

Jerome TAILLARD

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I’m not one to write trip advisor reviews but I just had to after experiencing Kanvas......

What an impeccable hotel moderately priced, located within in my opinion the best areas in Seminyak.

Firstly the moment you step inside, the decor is like no other here in Bali making you feel like your secluded away from the hustle and bustle of Seminyak yet within close proximity to some of Bali’s amazing new restaurants, nightlife and beach clubs just on your doorstep!!!!

The staff and the service from the airport driver to the reception staff is extremely experienced making it the most pleasant and fuss free stays I’ve had in Bali. 

I would like to give a special mention and thank you to Devi especially for coming to my rescue, having my flight cancelled upon arriving at the airport. After calling the hotel, Devi had immediately arranged the hotel shuttle service to promptly collect me while all the other passengers from the airline remained stranded!!!!!

Arriving back to the hotel at a late hour, the staff had me checked in and in a room faster than I’ve ever experienced (and I travel a lot).

Thank you Kanvas, I will definitely be back!!!
title: Kanvas to the rescue!!!

Devi indeed is always there to help in any way with her sparking personnality any trouble encountered during our guest time with us.
I do hope to see you back soon at home.

text:
From the moment we arrived we were greeted by the friendly staff and given a tour of our room. The hotel is stunning and has absolutely beautiful facilities, but there is more to Kanvaz than just bricks and mortar. The have a General Manager that listens and interacts with guests, they have a front of house manager who goes above and beyond and outstanding staff who were able to listen and cater for our family needs. The staff took the time to know our names and to look after our every request - sometimes you forget the details of holidays but you never forget the way you feel - it goes without saying that we indeed felt immense care and welcome from staff who interacted and made our small stay truly memorable. The best news for guests is that the hotel is only new and it will only get better!!

The food was fresh and we didn't get a bad dish on the menu, the cocktails and drink selection is A+ and the pool, well you only need look at the pictures. 

We will certainly be back to visit and they truly live up to the 'Home away from home' mantra. Thank you for making us feel special, welcomed and going above and beyond with your service.......we are excited to be back again in the near future.
title: Friendly, personal and amazing hospitality

text:
This stunning colonial style hotel is like an oasis you cannot help but be drawn to with its mammoth doors inviting you into its old world indoor greenery sitting area, it were easy from 1 visit to want to call this place our home away from home & we did just that - we cancelled our substandard accommodation & got lost in the magic that is Kanvaz for the rest of our stay.

The place is a thing of beauty,from the staff that immediately make you feel like family to the lush decor, amass of plants along your naturewalk to a room that allows you ample space to relax to a delicious breakfast from a glimpse inside 1 of the cleanest kitchens I have ever seen. We had a pool access room into an incredible pool, the surroundings of it were so relaxing I promptly fell asleep on my subbed on my private patio whilst soaking up the Bali sun for 2hrs!

My daughter & I were made to feel special our entire stay, Kanvaz has the right mix of interaction with its guests & the overall feeling of a great 'big hug' were never far away.

Kanvaz is inviting, it's warmth, it's a little slice of heaven & it's where I intend on bringing all my friends & family that visit Bali every year!

Thankyou Kanvaz Family, may you continue to grow & never lose your sparkle, my family looks forward to seeing your family again!

Regards Prestons
title: Diamond In The Rough, 10/10!

Having just opened it is easy to see that this resort has a great future ahead. From the personal welcome and check in to the immaculate and stylish rooms I could not have asked for more.

I can quite comfortably say that this will be my home away from home along with all the extra luxuries and more you would expect from a high end resort. 

Having visited Bali previously I can assure any travellers to not look elsewhere; the great location adds to its already alluring presence. 

Although recently opened the management staff are very well experienced and took care of my booking without hesitation. In particular Devi who handled my booking and Jerome who even sorted me out a DVD player; nothing is too much trouble for them.

May I also add (see pictures) that the rooms have been decorated without any expense spared and the direct pool access is an unmatched bonus I’m yet to see in any Seminyak hotel!

Hats off to everyone involved in the opening of this superb establishment.

Mr Patel

Le vrai point positif de cet hôtel est le personnel qui est très chaleureux et attentionné.

owner_response.text:
Dear Halimaf,

Heel erg bedankt voor je fantastische review. We zijn blij dat je genoten hebt van je verblijf in ons nieuwe huis. Onze goed ingerichte kamer, met een zwembad van 100 meter lang, en strategische locatie plus ons à-la-cartemenu samengesteld door onze getalenteerde chef-kok, helpen ons om een geweldige gastervaring te bieden. We waarderen uw erkenning voor de vriendelijke service, we zullen ervoor zorgen dat de complimenten aan het hele team worden doorgegeven. Aarzel niet om contact met ons op te nemen als we u kunnen helpen om uw terugkeer te regelen. We kijken er allemaal naar uit u weer te verwelkomen voor een andere onvergetelijke ervaring.

title: 残念です。

text:
In één woord: geweldig! Kanvaz is een heerlijk hotel in het centrum van Seminyak. Het hotel ligt aan de drukke hoofdweg, maar als je het hotel inloopt, kom je in een oase van rust. Rondom het hotel zijn winkeltjes, barretjes, restaurantjes en Spa’s. In 10 minuten loop je naar het strand.

Wij hadden een kamer grenzend aan het zwembad wat een aanrader is. Tot ongeveer 14 uur hadden we zon op ons “eigen” terras aan het zwembad. 

De kamers zijn nieuw, superschoon en van alle gemakken voorzien. Iedere dag krijg je schone lakens en iedere dag staat er water op de kamer. De minibar is goed gevuld en deze mag kosteloos leeg gedronken/gegeten worden. 

Het ontbijt is fantastisch. Heerlijke koffie, vers sap, vers fruit, broodjes en de rest mag je onbeperkt a la carte bestellen. 

Ten slotte, het personeel is ontzettend vriendelijk, behulpzaam, geïnteresseerd en beleefd en omdat we meer dan 3 nachten verbleven, bracht de hoteltaxi ons naar de luchthaven na de check out. 

Het enige minpunt is dat de gym en het zwembad op het dakterras nog niet open waren, maar daar wordt hard aan gewerkt. 

Conclusie: een tophotel!
title: Héérlijk hotel met centrale ligging

owner_response.text:
Beste Patricia M,

Bedankt voor je geweldige beoordeling. We zijn blij dat je een geweldig verblijf hebt gehad in ons nieuwe huis, hebt genoten van onze moderne, goed ingerichte lagune-toegangskamer en onze strategische locatie in het centrum van het levendige dorp Petitenget in Seminyak. Inderdaad, het geweldige ontwerp en de esthetische aantrekkingskracht in combinatie met vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel, evenals gevarieerde keuzes van ons ontbijt a la carte bereid door onze getalenteerde chef-kok helpen ons geweldige gastervaringen te maken.
Als je terugkomt, probeer dan ons nieuw geopende inspirerende restaurant, KAZA Restaurant is het nieuwe icoon in het resort en ons ELEMENTAL Spa, Gym en Beauty center heeft onlangs ook zijn deuren geopend voor al onze gasten.
Nogmaals hartelijk dank voor het aanbevelen en we kijken er naar uit je weer te mogen verwelkomen voor nog een heerlijke ervaring.

Met vriendelijke groet,
Kanvaz Resort Seminyak

text:
처음 호텔을 봤을때 예쁜 모습에 반했어요. 로비와 레스토랑, 수영장 모두 세련되고 감각있는 인테리어입니다. 

그런데 아쉬운 점이 있어요. 객실이 3층이었는데, 바로 위 옥상에서 공사하는 소음이 그대로 다 들렸습니다. 저녁에 체크인을 하고 야간 수영을 했는데 저녁 7시부터 저녁 8시 40분까지 드릴소리, 망치소리가 어마어마하게 크게 들렸어요. 대화소리가 들리지 않을 만큼 굉장히 시끄러웠지만 저희는 외출 예정이어서 따로 컴플레인을 해서 방을 바꾸지는 않았습니다. 하지만 호텔측의 배려가 아쉬웠습니다. 밖에서 보니 저희가 머문 룸 바로 위 옥상에서 작업을 하고 있더라구요. 
다음날 오전에도 계속 작업 소리가 들렸고 누군가 컴플레인을 한 것인지 오전 11시 이후에는 들리지 않았습니다. 룸 상태는 대부분은 만족하나 샤워실과 화장실의 문이 쾅쾅 닫혀서 어린이의 경우 위험할 수 있겠다고 생각이 들었어요. 
멋진 인테리어만큼이나 좀 더 배려깊은 서비스가 필요하다는 생각이 듭니다.
title: 예쁘고 멋지지만 아쉬운 점이 있네요.
